data.feedback: All file paths verified via Read/Glob. TechLead correctly identified existing patterns (sealed class, abstract final class, AppException.fromDioException, AppLogger, Environment). Architecture is sound with proper DI→Network→Storage layering. Stories have testable acceptance criteria.
issues: Minor: Epic-level filesToCreate includes analysis_options.yaml but it exists (Story 4 correctly has it in filesToModify)
suggestions: Move analysis_options.yaml from epic-level filesToCreate to filesToModify for consistency
